attributes.action: Stop torbay council leasing babbacombe beach
attributes.background:
Babbacombe beach is a stunning beaches 
Which doesn't need to change

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of  Torbay Council.

Torbay Council has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here:

http://www.torbay.gov.uk/petitions.htm
